did.abstract: A typewritten letter from Susan B. Anthony to Mr. E. Butterick of Brooklyn on behalf of the National-American Woman Suffrage Association, dated 1895. The letter invites Mr. Butterick to the 80th birthday celebration of Elizabeth Cady Stanton, in addition to soliciting a donation to the Association's campaign for womens' suffrage. The letter is signed with Ms. Anthony's signature.
